text: Aur jab aap koi moajza inn kay samney zahir nahi kertay to woh log kehtay hain kay aap yeh moajza kiyon na laye? Aap farma dijiye! Kay mein uss ka ittabaa kerta hun jo mujh per meray rab ki taraf say hukum bheja gaya hai yeh goya bohr si daleelen hain tumharay rab ki taraf say aur hodayat aur rehmat hai unn logon kay liye jo eman rakhtay hain
